name: Flu Season Mania
description:
The season of sickness is here! Infected children are coming into your hospital in droves. You are a hospital nurse curing infected kids with launchable vaccines. You don’t want to get too close to the kids as the diseases are highly contagious. The game itself is like a zombie invasion style top down shooter, but you help treat children instead!

Created by: 

Sahil Katrekar, Darren Lim, Justin Lin, Vivek Mogili
